name: A State of Confusion Multiple Choice Quiz | Word Play | 20 Questions

questions.text: They are playing _________ the yellow ball?
questions.explanation:
Tennessee.

	They are playing tennis. See the yellow ball?

questions.text: You know what they always say...."__________ loves company."
questions.explanation:
Missouri.

	You know what they always say...."Misery loves company."

questions.text: _________ lot of money to the IRS!
questions.explanation:
Iowa & Ohio.

	I owe a lot of money to the IRS! A reader also submitted Ohio- Oh, I owe a lot of money to the IRS!

questions.text: I have to give it to the IRS because I didn't pay my ________.
questions.explanation:
Texas.

	I have to give it to the IRS because I didn't pay my taxes.

questions.text: He's a typical male. He thinks he needs a knife ___________ for protection.
questions.explanation:
Oregon.

	He's a typical male. He thinks he needs a knife or a gun for protection.

questions.text: I did not get the email _______________ me about the latest urban legend virus hoax.
questions.explanation:
Massachusetts.

	I did not get the email message you sent me about the latest urban legend virus hoax. (booo!)

questions.text: Susan was hunting for the buried treasure, but the pirate map did not __________ the treasure was hidden, exactly.
questions.explanation:
Delaware.

	Susan was hunting for the buried treasure, but the pirate map did not tell her where the treasure was hidden, exactly.

questions.text: The lion had a beautiful ___________.
questions.explanation:
Maine.

	The lion had a beautiful mane.

questions.text: I don't know if Grandma still has that antique cherrywood table. ________________.
questions.explanation:
Alaska.

	I don't know if Grandma still has that antique cherrywood table. I'll ask her.

questions.text: They went to Turkey in search of Noah's _________________ absolutely nothing.
questions.explanation:
Arkansas.

	They went to Turkey in search of Noah's Ark and saw absolutely nothing.

questions.text: I know I asked for a small drink, but this is a real _______________!
questions.explanation:
Minnesota.

	I know I asked for a small drink, but this is a real mini soda!

questions.text: You talked to Tweety Bird? No doubt he tawt ________a puddy tat?
questions.explanation:
Utah.

	You talked to Tweety Bird? No doubt he tawt you taw a puddy tat?

questions.text: Is _______________ streets anywhere in this city where it's OK to park?
questions.explanation:
Arizona.

	Is there a zone of streets anywhere in this city where it's OK to park?

questions.text: This __________________ makes strong rope!
questions.explanation:
New Hampshire.

	This new hemp sure makes strong rope!

questions.text: Robin Hood and his men sure lived in a ______________!
questions.explanation:
Maryland.

	Robin Hood and his men sure lived in a merry land!

questions.text: I never __________________ was where tequila was produced.
questions.explanation:
New Mexico.

	I never knew Mexico was where tequila was produced.

questions.text: I'm not sure I like Mr. Bush. Isn't ___________  bit too much in favor of the oil industry?
questions.explanation:
Georgia.

	I'm not sure I like Mr. Bush. Isn't George a bit too much in favor of the oil industry?

questions.text: His prose was unnecessarily wordy and ____________ really hard work to read.
questions.explanation:
Florida.

	His prose was unnecessarily wordy and florid; a really hard work to read.

questions.text: I needed some new garden equipment, so I went to the hardware store where I _____________ and a shovel.
questions.explanation:
Idaho.

	I needed some new garden equipment, so I went to the hardware store where I eyed a hoe and a shovel.

questions.text: I saw a white deer! Is that the _____________ should be?
questions.explanation:
Colorado.

	I saw a white deer! Is that the color a doe should be?
